title: Find Local Government Representative
description: A citizen wants to find out who their city council representative is.

tasks.description: Gather the citizen's full street address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the citizen's address.

tasks.description: Use a GIS lookup tool to determine which council district the address falls into.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds the correct council district for the address.

tasks.description: Provide the name and contact information for the corresponding city council member.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct representative's information to the citizen.
